text_elements.text:
Key Findings & Results
Performance Achievements (Contribution C4)

56%+
Answer Accuracy on ARC
Against the original model.

<50%
Energy Consumption
Compared to 14B baseline, without sacrificing accuracy.

Routing Efficiency
Profile-based prompts optimize query distribution across DA, CoT, and RAG paths, improving balance.

Energy Insights
Accuracy directly correlates with efficiency, as incorrect answers consume more energy.

Performance Gap
Architectural control and prompt engineering narrows the performance gap to larger models.

Bottom Line
The adaptive routing framework enables SLMs to deliver enterprise-grade accuracy using <50% of the energy of larger models, making AI viable for resource-constrained organizations.
Adaptive Query-Routing Framework for Optimizing Small Language Models
